attributes.action: recognise Taiwan in addition to, or instead of, China
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British government still does not recognise Taiwan as an independent sovereign nation.

Mostly this is because China threatens, bullies and bribes nations that recognise Taiwan.

Taiwan is a major trading partner and has an excellent record on human rights and democracy, unlike China.

The British government should recognise Taiwanese sovereignty and establish full diplomatic relations.  If presented with an ultimatum by Beijing then the British government should favour Taiwan.
